TaskDescription: No task, electrical stimulation is performed. Patient is resting with eyes open/closed. The latter is not always specified.
InstitutionName: University Medical Center Utrecht, Division Brain, Clinical Neurophysiology Department
SubjectArtefactDescription: artefacts are annotated manually when patient moves (which gives artefacts in all electrodes), or when an electrode is malfunctioning for a short period of time
ElectricalStimulationParameters: See for more detail the events.tsv
